replies.msg:
小弟第一次去日本自駕遊
而家喺hotels.com到睇緊酒店
search果陣揀咗free parking嘅filter
㩒咗入去之後有啲就有喺option到寫有free parking
例如：

但係有啲就冇寫
例如：

明明下面果個都揀咗free parking嘅filter
但係喺呢到冇寫即係點?
同埋喺到book完之後洗唔洗send email比間酒店同佢講話要留泊車位比我?
第一次試自駕遊on99咁乜都唔知
唔該各位

冇留位先到先得，不過多數都有位。有啲直頭有幾個場任你泊
係咪free parking 上酒店官網睇下啦

如果住係城入面通常都冇free parking
就算你睇hotels.com 呢d 寫有parking 既酒店到時都有機會收你500-1200 yen泊車費

個人建議搵酒店唔好filter 要有泊車
一黎選擇多d二黎你會多好多平野揀
睇岩酒店再search 附近有冇注車場
通常都有24小時最大料金大約800-1000 yen不等

It's a safe bet that the yen will continue falling in the next four months so you might as well go on holiday in japan this year. I enjoy visiting the annual winter festival where I ride the thrill rides and eat sushi soaking up the nice christmassy atmosphere. The sunlight has been dazzlingly bright all week so you may just as well have a good long soak in an outdoor onsen soaking up the sun. In fact I've just got out of an onsen and am drying myself on a towel. I thoroughly recommend taking the airport express in ifc. It's very easy. Once you're at the ifc exit where you can head straight for Queens road central, enter ifc, go past the escalator in front of you and keep going until you come to another escalator. Go down it, turn left and go straight ahead. It's there. If you wanna travel to Nagasaki from Fukuoka station, go through the gate, go down the escalator and look at the sign. You'll see which side is bound for Nagasaki. If you wanna have a coffee in J.Cafe, take the lift to level three, go straight down the path and pass several shops until you come to an intersection. Turn right and it's there. If you want to take the lift to a higher floor, turn tight at the intersection, pass several shops until you see pure fitness on your left, enter pure fitness and the elevator is there. However if you ask me whether australia is a great place to holiday in, I wouldn't bet on it. There's nothing worth doing there. I like Japanese culture and food. I took the JLPT at N one level in tokyo. My reading far outshines my writing so the marks i lost in writing were offset by those i gained in reading. My friend Amy took the test too. She's a little weak in speaking but strong on listening so the marks she gained in the listening part offset those she lost in the speaking section. After the test we spent money on clothes and shoes like it was going out of fashion. We entered a casino and gambled like it was going out of fashion. If you enjoy being in japan you might spend money on food and cosmetic products like it's going out of fashion. You might go to the casino and gamble like it's going out if fashion like we did.

日本邊到
日本好多停車場
唔怕冇位泊車

我就唔理嘅
去幾次都係泊附近，有最大料金果啲
大多數酒店parking都要錢，多數1000円，仲要係立體駐車，你一下想出夜街攞車就麻煩
